io.sphere.sdk.queries

Interface EntityQuery<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Interface of the entity, i.e., Category interface
    All Superinterfaces:
    Query<T>, ReferenceExpandeable<T>, SphereRequest<PagedQueryResult<T>>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    CartDiscountQuery, CartQuery, CategoryQuery, ChannelQuery, CustomerGroupQuery, CustomerQuery, CustomObjectQuery<T>, DiscountCodeQuery, InventoryEntryQuery, MetaModelQueryDsl<T,C,Q,E>, OrderQuery, ProductProjectionQuery, ProductQuery, ProductTypeQuery, QueryDsl<T,C>, ReviewQuery, ShippingMethodQuery, StateQuery, TaxCategoryQuery, ZoneQuery
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomObjectQueryImpl, MetaModelQueryDslImpl

    public interface EntityQuery<T>
extends Query<T>, ReferenceExpandeable<T>
    Queries for entities with getters and copy functions for where, sort, limit and offset
